content.rendered:
Americas Oceania division

Patrick Sulliot, born in 1959, holds an engineering degree from the Ecole Nationale Supérieure des Arts et Métiers. He joined Eurovia in 1984 as a works engineer. He became agency director in Paris then Lyon, before being promoted to Rhône-Alpes Regional Director and then Deputy Director for Rhône-Alpes Auvergne in 2000. In 2007, he joined Eurovia Limited in the UK as Deputy Managing Director before moving to Deputy Director in charge of the UK, Spain and Chile in 2010. Patrick Sulliot was appointed Director for the Americas in 2012 and joined Eurovia’s Executive Committee in 2015 as Managing Director for the Americas and the United Kingdom.

As of February 2021, Patrick Sulliot heads the Americas Oceania division within the VINCI Construction pole.

excerpt.rendered: As of February 2021, Patrick Sulliot heads the Americas Oceania division within VINCI Construction.
